name: Escape from Confinement
description:
You are attempting to break out of your prison. Grab the gun, survive your way and find your well-earned freedom.

How to Play:

Use WASD key to Move.

Use mouse to aim, left click to shoot.

This game was created for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022. Thank you and we hope you enjoy our game!

Credit:

- Developed by: Chocolatto,  reverse90.

- Music & SFX by: Quang Long.
